mapper.sql: role_id as roleId, role_name as roleName, role_key as roleKey, role_sort as roleSort, create_time as createTime, description as description
mapper.select: select hr.role_id roleId, hr.role_name roleName, hr.description description from mms_login_information li inner join mms_role hr on hr.role_id = li.role_id where li.employee_ID= #{employeeID}
